from sys import stdin
from math import log10 as log

def leftrotate(N):
    s = str(N)
    return int(s[1:] + s[0])

def rightrotate(N):
    s = str(N)
    return int(s[-1] + s[:-1])

for trial in xrange(int(stdin.readline())):
    N = int(stdin.readline())
    lenN = int(log(N))
    best = max(leftrotate(rightrotate(N)),rightrotate(leftrotate(N)))
    nextL = nextR = N
    
    for i in xrange(lenN):
        nextL = leftrotate(nextL)
        nextR = rightrotate(nextR)
        if nextL > best: best = nextL
        if nextR > best: best = nextR
    print best
